packets.name: C00StatusRequest
packets.desc: Sent by the client to query the server lore.

packets.name: C00StatusResponse
packets.desc: Sent by the server in response to a client query for the server lore.

parameters.name: JSON Response
parameters.desc: The server lore encoded in json.

packets.name: C01PingRequest
packets.desc: Sent by the client to query the ping to the server.

packets.name: C01PingResponse
packets.desc: Sent by the server as a response to a query for the ping by the client.
